QuestData.Title: Living Amber
QuestData.Description: Liquid amber is most efficient for restoring a newly awakened paragon's strength, and is usually provided at a wakening ceremony.$B$BUnfortunately, it seems you did not receive these instructions, so we shall have to improvise.$B$BI can sense a vast quantity of fossilized amber in the lake below us. It will serve, but I am too weak to dig it up myself.$B$BDo this for me, and I will see to it that you are rewarded.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Living Amber, then feed them to Korven the Prime.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you understand, Wakener? The amber gives life.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, Wakener. That is enough for now.

Objectives.Objective: Living Amber fed to Korven the Prime
